text: Ra yadagara jaba hamile jinnaharuko eka samuhala'i timitira pravrtta garyaum taki uniharule kura'ana sunun, taba jaba uniharu nabiko pasama a'e ta (apasama) bhanna thale ki ‘‘cupa laga’’, ani jaba tyo (kura'anako patha) pura bhayo ta uniharu aphna jatibandhula'i savadhana garna tyatatira pharke
